abstrac: We Help Your Business Grow Online! 100% Recommended on Guru!
bio:
We are a full service IT company Located in the national capital of India, New Delhi.

We provide full range IM and web/mobile App, design & development services under one roof. We design, develop and code amazing Mobile Apps and websites that hit the perfect balance between appearance and functionality and once presence on the web has been established it’s time for promoting it and letting others know about the spectacle that has been created. It’s time for our internet marketing team to take over.

We provide full range of internet marketing services including Search engine optimization, social media management, brand development & management and much more.

From organic search engine optimization for large business and brands with national and global reach requirements to local SEO for local businesses with block to city level reach requirements. Whether you need Natural rank progression in SERPs to Paid advertisement through banner ads and Facebook , Bing and Adwords PPC . Our expert team is always ready armed with their result oriented work process to help you in your endeavor in taking to business to new heights.
We are a team of professionals who excel in their fields and have the aptitude and the mandate to go beyond the call of duty and travel that proverbial extra mile to ensure one hundred percent satisfaction of the client. Our team is passionate and simply love what they do and they have over the past few years researched and developed processes that are result oriented and focused towards extracting the best ROI for our clients.

Our team ardently researches to stay up to date with the latest updates in the industry and to keep abreast with the latest trends in Mobile /Website designs and development. 

Our SEO team keeps fully informed about the latest updates in the Google Search engine algorithms and updates our work processes to keep them in line with the White-Hat best practices. Therefore all our processes are Google Panda and Penguin proof.

# Milestone based payments. All milestones to be paid upfront.
# Hourly Payments with minimum Payable due in advance
# Any customization other than already agreed in the project documents must be mutually agreed and mentioned through a new milestone and paid for separately.
# No Refunds are Possible at "Any" stage other than complete cancellation of the project at the start on mutually agreed terms. Some project initiation and consultation charges will be levied and still payable by the client.

bio:
Hello everyone.
I am a skilled and experienced web and mobile developer with more than 8 years of experience in the field of big and small online business development.


My main skills are frontend development - React, Vue, Angular, JavaScript.

bio:
⭐Hi, everyone⭐
I am a senior software engineer with more than 5+ years of experience working in web development. 
I am a masterful problem-solver and boast an extensive portfolio of finished professional products.
 I also enjoy creating beautiful software with equally impressive code.
 Along with possessing a talent for understanding and refactoring large code-base, I believe in best practices, small functions, and white space.
I am always striving to find new and more effective ways to solve problems. 
I enjoy working through all the stages of development and I place a lot of importance on writing clean, well-documented, and easy-to-maintain code. 
Communication with the client is a crucial part of web development and I make it a priority to be responsive as well as report regularly on the development process.

bio:
Over the last 9+ years, Adequate Infosoft Pvt.Ltd. have developed a wide range of software including sites for startup companies, entrepreneurs and small businesses. 

Adequate Infosoft Pvt. Ltd. is one of the reputed Software Development for Web, Mobile, Desktop as well as Embedded App Development Companies in India that can help you to define your brand and increase your products/or services demand through a customer-centric and data-driven approach for two decades. We understand the importance of an attractive website in today's digital age and be sure to incorporate all aspects of digital marketing such as SEO, PPC, content marketing, and more to achieve outstanding results.

We provide the following services as follows:

1.  Web Application Development, 
2.  Mobile Application Development, 
3.  Custom Software Development and 
4.  IoT/Embedded Development
5.  Maintenance and QA Testing.
6.  SEO/SMO Services

We are having experienced many technologies as follows:

1. .Net - Telerik, Silverlight, C#, ASP.Net, VB.Net, DevExpress, MVC, LINQ, SQLServer, DotNetNuke, Entity Framework, SOA Architecture, Kendo UI, Azure 
2. PHP -  Zend, YII, CodeIgniter, Laravel, CakePHP, Magento, Wordpress, Woo-Commerce, PrestaShop, Joomla, Drupal,  MySQL, Core PHP, Symphony, Shopify, OSCommerce
3. Mobile App - Android and iPhone App development. Native, Hybrid and apps 
based on HTML5 (Responsive), Xamarin, Titanium, Flutter, Objective C, ReactNative, etc.
4. Designing -  HTML5, Bootstrap, AngularJS, Node.js, jQuery, React.js, meteor.js, 
 backbone.js, SharePoint
5. Database-  MYSQL, MSSQL, MongoDB, SQL, Oracle 
6. Embedded Development: Python, Arduino, Embedded System, Raspberry Pi, Django, etc.

We are also in SEO - On Page/Off page/SEO optimization and have experienced in providing SEO services.

We always believe in long-term relationships with our clients and reach the deadlines with the reliability of the project.

Availability- 40 hrs/week, 
Flexible with All Time Zones.
Quality Support- Yes, 
Communications Skills- Excellent In English.

abstrac: Competence, Commitment, Confidence and Customer Orientation
bio:
Strategic Alliance is a I.T. Service Provider located in Surat, Gujarat, India. The company was founded by Tejesh Patel in 2004 with a vision to establish it as the single point solution provider for Information Technology Services by providing the best fit optimum processes(Right technical solutions and services at right time) to our clients so as to establish a long term Strategic Alliance with them.

Today  Strategic Alliance has a team capacity of 50 professionals and it specializes in the following domains:
1) e-Commerce, 
2) e-Governance, 
3) Education  
4) Social Networking domains. 

We have Hundreds of happy clients around the world 
• Clients in USA, UK, Canada, Australia, Japan, Sweden, etc.
• Two-third business from repeat clients
• One in five clients has engaged us since more than 6 years.
• Our clients are our marketing channels

Strategic Alliance is a Single Point Solutions Provider for all your Information Technology needs.
• Websites : HTML5, CSS3, Jquery, Joomla, Wordpress, etc.
• Webbased Applications : ASP.Net, PHP, JSP
• Desktop Applications : Microsoft.Net, Java
• Mobile Applications : iOS, Android, Blackberry, Windows

We have Over 4000 man-months of collective experience 
• Average experience of more than 3 years
• More than 20 distinct accreditations/certifications amongst the team
• Highly motivated and professional work force
• Each resource possesses appropriate certifications from vendors like Microsoft, Zend, etc.

We have a very High standard of professional ethics 
• Guaranteed Confidentiality and Non-disclosure of IPR
• High protection of client Intellectual Property Rights
• Transparent working environment
• Rational estimation and billing

Our Engagement models are designed to suit your requirements 
• Dedicated Resource Engagement Model
• Offshore Development Center Engagement Model
• Project Based Engagement Model
• Task Based Engagement Model

PROJECT  MANAGEMENT  STYLE
• We assign a dedicated project leader who acts as a point of contact for one and all of your projects.
• The project leaders are available to you using Skype and Google Hangout during the business hours and on cellphone during emergencies.
• We use SAPMS portal, a project management tool developed by us and used by many for communicating and collaborating with the client and the client’s team.
• We prefer to use AGILE Development style with fortnightly or monthly sprints depending upon the size of the project.
• You get realtime updates of the status of different tasks using SAPMS portal and can share your concerns in realtime.

HOURS  OF  OPERATION
• We normally work from 9AM to 7.30PM IST (Indian Standard Time) 
• Upon prior scheduled appointments our Project Leaders are available from 6AM to 1AM IST
• For emergency support we are available 24x7

PAYMENT   TERMS
• We prefer to use Guru.com Safepay / Escrow for all our projects.

• For fixed quote projects less than USD.3000/- :
o 100% project amount is to be escrowed upfront
o No payments to be released upfront
o 50% amount to be released on first working demo
o 30% amount to be release on fixing of all reported bugs
 o 20% to be released before code hand over and deployment to production.

• For fixed quote projects more than USD.3000/- :
o 20% or USD.1000/- (whichever is bigger) to be released upfront
o 70% to be released in parts based on mutually agreed milestones
o 10% to be released before code hand over and deployment to production.

• For Hourly chargeable basis projects :
o A week’s payment for the agreed team is to be escrowed at the start of the week and released at the end of week’s work reported.

• For Dedicated Resource Model :
o A month’s charges are to be escrowed upfront.
o A fortnight’s payment is to be made upfront before the start of a month.
o Balance payment is to be released at the end of the month.

abstrac: Right Words at the Right Place at the Right Time
bio: Whether you want a humorous article, comprehensive eBook or a technical piece, I can come up with the right tone and writing style to produce content that falls in line with your mission statement and overall marketing goals. I do not use fixed formulas, and I am proud to serve clients who value unique web content. My expertise is not limited to one industry; my skills and experience allow me to write for all kinds of industries and audiences. Unique, High-Quality Content for Every Client On-Demand: You can always count on my professional writing skills to serve your unique requirements. I can develop a sales page where visitors will be forced to click “buy now” or even create a blog that improves your brand awareness. All this, and much more, will be provided to you on-demand.

- I prefer Guru SafePay. 
- No upfront payment.
- You may release the funds when your project is complete and you are satisfied with the work :)
